content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own crochet sweater scarfl using this crochet pattern in pdf format **finished measurements** *inch* width 14 17 5 length 94 5 110 *cm* width 35 45 cm length 240 280 cm this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 4 pages including the cover page available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/crochet-sweater-scarf/ ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg #plussize #sizeinclusive
